SELECT /*结算-核销-根据运单号查询未核销的应收单*/
FROM STL.T_STL_BILL_RECEIVABLE R WHERE R.WAYBILL_NO IN
#{item}
AND R.UNVERIFY_AMOUNT > 0 AND R.ACTIVE=#{active} AND (R.BILL_TYPE IN ('OR', 'DR', 'DP', 'DL', 'AA') AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM PKP.T_SRV_WAYBILL_SIGN_RESULT WS WHERE WS.WAYBILL_NO = R.WAYBILL_NO AND WS.ACTIVE='Y') OR R.BILL_TYPE NOT IN ('OR', 'DR', 'DP', 'DL', 'AA'))
